review: roku is a great idea but every model of it is has very poor programming. They constantly lose the ability to contect to your wifi signal and will not reconnect. The units do not forget your wifi setup even after doing a factory reset and won't work. Although customer support is available they lack the knowledge of how to fix the issue. Now someay say that I don't know what I'm doing and that I need to reset my router but considering I do know what I am doing and the other 30 pieces of equipment in the house do not have a problem and both of my Roku's do each time they lose electric current there is no doubt it's the product. It's sad because it is a nice product. Also they do not support veriozon fios.
